description: Visualization for status of Dashboards - read from Kafka. Filterable by tags for further granularity.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "admin_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "device_status" and
    r._field == "AllBypassFlight" and
    r.site =~ /${site:regex}/ and 
    r.harbour =~ /${harbour:regex}/ and
    r.area =~ /${area:regex}/ and 
    r.direction =~ /${direction:regex}/ and
    r.zone =~ /${zone:regex}/ and 
    r.deviceStatus =~ /${status:regex}/ and 
    r.deviceType =~ /${type:regex}/ and
    r.deviceMode =~ /${mode:regex}/
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      _value:
        if r._value == "1" then 1
        else if r._value == "0" then 0
        else 0
  }))

from(bucket: "admin_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "device_status" and
    r._field == "SiloBypass" and
    r.site =~ /${site:regex}/ and 
    r.harbour =~ /${harbour:regex}/ and
    r.area =~ /${area:regex}/ and 
    r.direction =~ /${direction:regex}/ and
    r.zone =~ /${zone:regex}/ and 
    r.deviceStatus =~ /${status:regex}/ and 
    r.deviceType =~ /${type:regex}/ and
    r.deviceMode =~ /${mode:regex}/
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      _value:
        if r._value == "1" then 1
        else if r._value == "0" then 0
        else 0
  }))

from(bucket: "admin_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "device_status" and
    r._field == "CheckSystemEnabled" and
    r.site =~ /${site:regex}/ and 
    r.harbour =~ /${harbour:regex}/ and
    r.area =~ /${area:regex}/ and 
    r.direction =~ /${direction:regex}/ and
    r.zone =~ /${zone:regex}/ and 
    r.deviceStatus =~ /${status:regex}/ and 
    r.deviceType =~ /${type:regex}/ and
    r.deviceMode =~ /${mode:regex}/
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      _value:
        if r._value == "1" then 1
        else if r._value == "0" then 0
        else 0
  }))

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "admin_bucket",
  tag: "site",
  predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "device_status"
)
list.label: Site
list.name: site
